org.spongepowered.api.data.manipulators.items

Interface CloneableData

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<CloneableData>, DataManipulator<CloneableData>, DataSerializable, IntData<CloneableData>, SingleValueData<Integer,CloneableData>

    public interface CloneableData
extends IntData<CloneableData>
    Represents an item that can be cloned or copied.

    Some items can be cloned or copied with crafting.

    Some items may prevent further cloning after a specified generation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getGeneration()
      Gets the generation of this cloneable item.
      int getGenerationLimit()
      Gets the generational limit to which the item would no longer be cloneable by normal means.
      void setGeneration(int generation)
      Sets the generation of this cloneable item.

    • Method Detail

      • getGeneration

        int getGeneration()
        Gets the generation of this cloneable item.

        The original always starts as generation 0.

        Returns:
        The generation of the cloneable item

      • setGeneration

        void setGeneration(int generation)
        Sets the generation of this cloneable item.

        The original always starts as generation 0.

        Parameters:
        generation - The generation of this item

      • getGenerationLimit

        int getGenerationLimit()
        Gets the generational limit to which the item would no longer be cloneable by normal means.
        Returns:
